column1: MRI image size (256, 128, 1) of the head of a man of 37 years old with weighting in T2, of axial section. We observe slice n°147 beginning from the base of the skull. We see clearly: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 3761.2793 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4031.5430 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 489.1113 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 31.6406 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 108.1055 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 3584.6191 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4108.0078 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 494.3848 mm³, the right thalamus proper of volume 26.3672 mm³ and the right caudate nucleus of volume 160.8398 mm³.
